description: Tribes: Vengeance is a first-person shooter in which players use power armor, jetpacks, frictionless skis, and a variety of weapons to fight enemies and each other. The game features both a single player campaign mode and five multiplayer modes. Both modes are played on a variety of game maps.

Each game map is associated with a TVM file, which Tribes: Vengeance uses to load that map and its related assets (saved in a PKG file). Single player TVM files' names start with SM . Multiplayer TVM files' names start with MP . Players can find all of Tribes: Vengeance's TVM files in the following directory:

NOTE: Vivendi Universal stopped supporting Tribes: Vengeance in 2005. Hi-Rez Studios released Tribes: Vengeance as freeware in 2015. Fans currently maintain Tribes: Vengeance on the website TribesRevengence.
